items.title: Improve Your Life and Happiness with the Power of Gratitude
items.headline: Learn how to appreciate all the good in your life and thereby create even more of it with an attitude of gratitude
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn about the power gratitude has to improve all aspects of your life.
You will learn a number of scientifically proven interventions and exercises allowing you to create your own gratitude practice.

items.title: Being Happy: Your guide to true & lasting happiness
items.headline: True happiness is within everyone's grasp through a process known as Self-Actualization. Learn how.
objectives_summary: Know what the characteristics of a self-actualised person are
Understand that true happiness comes from achieving your fullest potential as a human being
Understand that your primary reality is a rich inner life

items.headline: The law of attraction- attract what you want in life helps you attract all the things you want in life.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to master the law of attraction and attract the things you always wanted in your life .

In this course you will learn the secret of law of attraction by changing your beliefs , words,vibrations and achieve your goals and desired life by attracting the things you always wanted and not the things you did not want in your life.

items.title: Get Organised:Sentimental Items (Declutter,Clutter-Clearing)
items.headline: Honour the past without being stuck. Let go - without regrets. Shift dead energy. Make room for the new! Be happy.
caption_languages: ภาษาอังกฤษ
objectives_summary: Let go of sentimental items you don't really like or need, without feeling guilty
Choose which sentimental items are important - and you should keep - and let go of the rest
Appreciate the best - by tossing the rest
